content.question: Which of the following is a supply-side fiscal policy that could stimulate economic growth?

choices.label: A decrease in income tax credits
A decrease in marginal income tax rates
A decrease in the sales taxes imposed on household goods
An increase in the discount rate
An increase in the money supply

content.answer: A decrease in marginal income tax rates

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
